name: Brian Osman
title: Principal Consultant
text: We deliver training that is based on improving the way testers see, think, interact with others and with the system under test. This is one way to show our value-add as testers. We are community focused liaising with like-minded, free thinking testers and take the opportunity to present at conferences and SIGsT groups.

col2values.valuetext: You may have hidden the plans in the escape pod but we will send a detachment down to retrieve them, and have our Commanders see to it personally. Therell be no one to stop us this time!
This will be a day long remembered. It has seen the end of Kenobi, and will soon see the end of the rebellion.
We don’t need to see your identification … Those aren’t the droids we’re looking for … You can go about your business … Move along

col3values.valuetext: We have no problem with that.
Question: What does not exist in this Dojo?

col3values.valuehead: Strike First. Strike Hard. No Mercy.
col3values.valuetext: We do not train to be merciful here. Mercy is for the weak. Here, in the streets, in competition: A man confronts you, he is the enemy. An enemy deserves no mercy.
